bibl.title: Sitologia in Roman Egypt.
bibl.note: Reproduit de: JJurP 4 (1950) pp. 289-307 et pll. IV-VI. - P. Fouad Inv. 233 (= S.B. VI, 9310). A Duplicate Report of two Sitologi and Episphragistae to the Strategos of the Lycopolite Nome. Lycopolite Nome (?), 3 July A.D. 229. Mentions 6 wooden Greek seals in the Coptic Museum (Inv. 1029; 1033; 1034; 49950; 49952; Nr. unknown).

bibl.title: Zaki ALY, Essays and Papers. A Miscellaneous Output of Greek Papyri from Graeco-Roman Egypt

Reproduit de: JJurP 4 (1950) pp. 289-307 et pll. IV-VI. - P. Fouad Inv. 233 (= S.B. VI, 9310). A Duplicate Report of two Sitologi and Episphragistae to the Strategos of the Lycopolite Nome.
